briefTitle: A Safety and Efficacy Study of Xyrem速 (Sodium Oxybate) to Treat Fibromyalgia.
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Safety and Efficacy Study of Xyrem速 (Sodium Oxybate) in Subjects With Fibromyalgia.
summary: The objective of this trial is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of Xyrem速 compared to placebo for the treatment of fibromyalgia in a randomized, double blind, placebo controlled, parallel group trial.

primaryOutcome.measure: Pain VAS (Visual Analog Scale) Response. Percentage of Subjects With a Greater Than or Equal to 30% Reduction in Pain VAS From Baseline (BOCF).
